story:
Summary of our story

μεράκι (me'raci)
care /substantive, zest /male,  passion /feminine
Else - Otherwise  
[μεράκι, το] [me'raci, the] care, craftsmanship by heart, true interest

  

“itGReat” is a venture that was born out of “meraci” of three individuals who share the same values regarding health & wellbeing, a deep love for their country and most of all great respect for the history and tradition of their own birth land, the “blessed Cretan Terra”. Abstaining from all impersonal and faceless norms of market logic with set to cater prospective clients and the public through quality principles of service and a high sense of accountability.

Our first step was to use technology to communicate our plan. We created a platform that combines an informational blog, e-shop, & free services, based on the values ​​of the Cretan Mediterranean diet and its unique functional food properties.

Create a series of modern nutritional tools, as well as an opportunity for sound advice through consultants and services accessible on daily basis through the nutritional Blog portal located in  www.itgreatchoice.com

Disseminate some of our deep “meraci” & nostalgia for numerous amazing tastes and flavors that have been registered into our memory when children playing in grandma’s kitchen. 

Help respect small cultivators who are the only ones to offer forgotten authentic taste experiences we love, through authentic recipes, and provide an opportunity to sample the “old” culinary ways and adopt habits beneficial for health and life.

Supports growers hard efforts and persistence to keep traditional methods and ways of cultivation to help them preserve the quality of their products.

Our goal was to offer this uniqueness together high quality standards, from  production to consumption, using as start point our land  & finish your doorstep.

After 2 years of hard work, without any financial support, our efforts become something visible

-  A lot of what we did & still try to do…philosophy & vision can be found on following  sections, our videos and website.  This is what we did, a tiny step to where we want to go.
_____________________________________________________________________________

So... we are here to talk about why we need you.

- Why we can’t go on without your help. 

- Share our dream … and its  obstacles

- Offer opportunities to embark in a journey like no other…

                


TO PROMOTE HEALTH & WELL BEING: to service people who regard food quality, proper nutrition knowledge / practices and natural care products as integral parts of an effort to preserve and promote health and consider them absolutely necessary in achieving well-being.

Provide Access to :  Food products of highest standard & Ways of quality consumption, Quality cosmetics, Knowledge and  Nutrition services through selected, dietetic professionals.  Select & support product cultivators by strict and traditional reliability standards with distinct products based on nutritional and taste value. Exceptional cosmetics made of the purest, natural ingredients that may cover and array of skin care needs. Information & nutrition advice: Discuss current nutritional issues and ambivalent nutrition information. Provide specific nutritional advice and insight.

_____________________________________________________________________________

... What we ask 

As you already heard, Greece unfortunately, entered a very deep economic & social crisis. 2015 was a very critical year with capital controls & crippling taxes, that knelt down business efforts of any kind (partners - producers & cultivators)

We are dedicated & passionate to make it work regardless the crisis

To make a restart, using your support & trust.

With a small funding, you will get in return proposals and ways, to integrate Cretan culinary culture & experience in your daily routine . A truly beneficial proposal for you & your families!

With your support we will go a little farther by completing all necessary procedures for branding & standardizing all those Greek treasures that our producers make,  and  our land offers.

  

With your confidence & funding, we will support closely one of our partners

The St. Basils Women's Social cooperative. Part of your money will help them obtain all extra necessary certificates for their excellent Cretan pastries, snacks, & bakery goods.

It will give them new hope and work to do

New opportunities for our village unemployed women.

_____________________________________________________________________________



What you can get

We created

Unique Perks including

  • Functional Food combinations & Nutrition ( 6perks) + 1 free book & e-book
  • Greek, Mediterranean diet LiveWebinars (1 perk) + 1 free book & e-book
  • A Great  book of wellness & longevity (1perk) + free e-book
  • Funny T-shirts & Aprons (1perk) + free e-book
  • Aegean sea sailing perk - Sail with us (1perk +1free +Food Giveaways)
  • Food travel Trip to amazing Crete. (1perk +1free +Food Giveaways)

Gastronomic visits, wonderful places, museums, history, culture…. unique holidays,

We will open our homes for you,  with our cooking hands on with grand moms & aunties, but most of all we will provide initiation to the secrets of flavor & lifestyle.

_____________________________________________________________________________

***********************************************
CHECK DETAILS ON ALL OFFERED PERKS HERE
***********************************************

Get an idea of Perks offered below:
____________________________________________________________________________

T-Shirt with the Minoan Lady                           The Cretan Druid Apron
____________________________________________________________________________

Webminar sneak preview
What our nutritionist will talk about & cover in 1 of 6 seminars 




* this is not the seminar it self but an axis of information covered on the 6 section -  first person video seminars provided via dedicated platform.



___________________________________________________________________________


     Food Perk Sample

____________________________________________________________________________
                                                         

                                                           Preview 50 pages of our Great Book Perk

 


Both in Hardcover & e-book format.
Can be obtained as individual Perk in hardcover, e-book format in contribution perks  or get it for free with higher perks as an added value. 
___________________________________________________________________________
Give us the opportunity to show you first hand what this is all about .
Select the perk that meets your criteria and embark in a wonderful trip to nature & taste.

Details on our sailing & food travel perks
Date schedules can be found here

Perk : Food travel in Crete


( Sample of Herakleion Town in Crete & its marvels)

Perk : Sail your itGReat Choice


(Sail with us & explore the sea and flavors of Greek islands)

___________________________________________________

Support our mission 

                                      Get Greatness at your doorstep

Become a member of a our itGReat Greek Family

Give us the chance!!

Greece always had & has great things to offer!

HELP – SPONSOR – DONATE

____________________________________________________________________________


Other Ways You Can Help

Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign & dreams.

  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Tell a friend
  • Forward our posts 
  • Share our parallel campaigns in social media

story:
“Home, is where I want to be

But I guess I'm already there..”

(Talking Heads-This must be the place)

Hello, I’m Saverio Lenzi, I’m a student and will graduate in Cooperation at the University of Florence next spring. I’ve recently been contacted through the University by an energetic and visionary Workers Cooperative (AWC) in Sierra Leone, one of the poorest countries in Africa. Their idea is simple and yet revolutionary: help their manufacturing company to get out from the Ebola-triggered difficulty; import the cooperative idea; have a strong say in the company Board; basically became owners of their workplace!

I’m here to spread the message and help them empower themselves. Own the workplace as they own their Home!

Why this campaign?

T0 find donors for the finance of AWC, the workers Cooperative, to help the juice manufacturing company they work for:  Africa Felix Juice.  

How will be the money used?

If we reach the target, the company will be able NOT to need a local bank to pre-finance production.
If only part of the money is raised, then the interest payment will only be lower.
In ANY case, the Cooperative will have a seat in the Company Board, ensuring a more democratic governance.
To start with, 

what exactly is this company?

Africa Felix Juice (AFJ) was born on October 2010, by a joint effort of a group of people from all over the world with a progressive and sustainable idea of business and a love for development and for Africa.

They received a conditional grant by the Dutch Government, on a scheme called PSI.AFJ proudly claims to provide the 1st Made in Sierra Leone manufactured product the country has EVER exported.The factory produces fruit juice concentrate of pineapples, mangoes, cashew apples and papayas, all indigenous crops, which are collected from over 4,000 mainly subsistence farmers in the country.
The Dutch government has also helped AFJ to embrace values of fairness and respect for workers: equal opportunity job, two members of the senior management are women; no to under-age workers and fair treatment of all the 42 workers, ensuring a 30% higher wage than the legal minimum pay.
The company achieved Fairtrade certification in 2012 (suspended in 2014) and in the same year passed a stringent audit by German independent industry body SGF, showing that production standards can be the same in Africa as in Europe. The workers were of enormous help to build an awesome supply chain – in the most challenging of environments and achieve good productivity goals. The first few years saw unfortunately a few production problems (boiler, generator, filler) but the boys learned from the mistakes and grew from strength to strength. Imagine that in 2015 they managed 45 production days with a crew of only locals.

   

Some of the workers gathering pineapples.

Two farmers showing a yellow papaya!

Why are we here? What has gone wrong in this innovative reality?

The company started with limited capital (in 2010 the biggest financial crisis after WWII had only just finished, remember?) and relied on local banks for working capital – a very important feature, for a seasonal production business, at a whopping 23% (later 18%) interest rate. Which when you earn in dollars and spend in local currency could be ok, if the latter continued to devaluate as it did after the civil war.

As a matter of fact, it didn’t and from 2011 to 2013 AFJ suffered the ‘perfect storm’, with low end product prices (juice concentrate is a commodity, after all), unfavourable exchange rate, high fuel prices (did we tell you that AFJ is not on the electric grid and all the power needs to come from a generator?) and some production teething problem.

When we thought we had seen it all, then Ebola came! Nobody suffered among the factory workers and in the surrounding villages but the country virtually stopped working and export became extremely difficult. Imagine that Ghana for instance imposed a total import ban from Sierra Leone, without any logic.

Now AFJ is back on track, but really need to raise more capital to stop paying interest to the bank and build a strong future for workers and farmers.

What has been the workers'reaction to all these adversities?

After the terrible effects of the Ebola crisis were clear, there were only two ways to react: being passive and wait for the events to decide your future, or face the situation head on and try to do your best to change it! The latter has been the answer for AFJ’s workers, the real main characters of this campaign!

I’ve been contacted by Marie Charles, the accountant of the company. She got all the workers together and decided to do a revolutionary action to preserve their “home”: finance the part of capital the company needs and become, as they always felt to be , an active part within it!

A Cooperative has been founded, AFJ Workers Cooperative, (AWC) that is now the vehicle through which this Will is operating, a Will that has been developed during the past 4 years, but that presently is looking for a future!
This is something really trailblazer, and as the say goes “The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all”, this idea stimulated me to help them with all my passion and ability!They can’t accept to lose something they feel to belong, something they have seen growing up day by day: literally!  More than the 80% of the current workers are the very builders of all the factory premises!
When I say that this is their home, I’m not exaggerating: they have assembled it, they got it to run, they have develop it and now they are trying to improve it!This would be the very first experience in Sierra Leone in which workers could be able to become at the same time employer and employees, revolutionizing from the core the usual top-down ownership system in the developing world!
Presently, AWC members are collecting what money they can to start become Owners.

Are you willing to help them?

Your help will be incredibly useful to realize our dream and succeed keeping this reality alive and get it to prosper. The money need can’t obviously come entirely from the worker finances! All what we will be able to collect with this campaign will go directly to the cooperative, AFW Workers Cooperative , through a banking account at First International Bank in Sierra Leone and it will be used only to buy shares of Africa Felix Juice!
You can be able to be witness and advocate of a pioneer idea of company governance and, above all, be able to help the 42 worker’s families and the 4000 farmers to continue believe in their dream: develop their country and community with their own resources!
Give a better chance to Sierra Leone and to AFJ workers!

Team photo:"The production staff of Africa Felix Juice":Top Row Left to Right:  Murray Sankoh,Said M. Seay, Mabinty Kabia,Musa kargbo Allie Bangura,Mohamed Turay, Mohamed Sesay,Joseph Davies, Komboh Bangura,Abdulai Sankoh,Momoh,
Bottom  Row Left to Right:Peter J. Allie, Peter Trye, Bobby Thorpe, Ibrahim Bangura, Foday Sesay, Sampha Conteh Abubakar Conteh, Mohamed Jawara

The way ahead :what we want to change through this campaign.

Discovering a country: SIerra Leone!

The Republic of Sierra Leone, is a West African country, in which approximately 6 million people from several ethnic groups live. Sierra Leone has a glorious past, with Freetown being the biggest settlement of freed slaves in Africa and with Fourah Bay College being the first university in Sub-Saharian Africa. Annie Welsh School was also the first girls only school in the continent. When independence was achieved in 1961, with the many natural resources, educated working force and an enviable location, the future looked bright.

It wasn’t to be. The more recent past of this country hasn’t been the luckiest, in fact the population suffered a terrible civil war which affected it for over a decade. The war, fueled by greed of foreign governments and strong illegal arm lobbies, became notorious for its hand chopping atrocities and for the Blood Diamond movie.

This obviously hindered proper development, relegating Sierra Leone at 183 out of 187 position on the most recent Human Development Index, the most important indicator of the quality of life in a country. The more worrying data about this index that includes all the most important measures of wellness of a country is the child mortality, one of the worst in the world: 148 out of 1000 deaths.

After the civil war the economy of the country tried to create a safe path to the development, but has been seriously threatened by the tremendous effects of the notorious Ebola outbreak: since spring 2014 more than 5000 died and almost 14.000 cases have been certified.

What is our reply to all these adversities?

Rather than be persuaded to accept this unfair reality the AFJ’s workers decided to risk everything and fight for it! It appears to be almost a contradiction, but it’s not hard to understand: “It is impossible to win the great prizes of life without running risks, and the greatest of all prizes are those connected with home” (Theodore Roosevelt).
This is an incredible example of perseverance that everybody, as human being, has to appreciate: the change is possible and it’s just a step away!
A powerful proof of the resilient capacity the AFJ workers have developed during their work experience, has occurred facing the Ebola crisis.
In fact not only they decided to keep working even in adverse and dangerous condition, but they have been able to run the production with a completely local crew!

This campaign aim involves a community on 360 degrees basis: starting from work, then families and most important the future.

Be our ally to change the status quo in Sierra Leone!

Other ways to help and support us:

This is our story, but it’s not everything! This reality is bigger and even more beautiful, if you want to know more about it you are warmly invited to visit our  Facebook page  or our You Tube Channel
There you will find something that I hope you can find interesting and pleasant: I asked all the AWC members to be themselves testimonial of this campaign, filming themselves in a short video describing their role within the company and why the company is important to them! (Please forgive the mixed quality, but we have done our best! )
A lot of refreshing testimonies have been collected, hoping to make you feel more involved in this Sierra Leone’s reality!
Here there is an inspiring and modest idea of what you are going to find: “ Africa Felix Juice has helped me greatly with my family, it has done so much things to build my life ,to build my family and my children, that for now are all going to school and doing well!” from Mohamed Jawara ,the electrician.


Finally, there are so many ways to help us even beyond the campaign:
it would be great if you could share our story on your social network as Facebook, twitter or Google+, helping us to reach a larger number of people!

Then you can talk with all the people you know, family, friends or in your working place trying to spread what we are and what we need ,showing our Facebook page or our Youtube channel!

Finally if you are interested in helping us, I ask you to be creative, suggesting us all the ways you can think to spread or improve this campaign, all your suggestions would be surely useful!

You can contact me, saverio.lenzi@gmail.com, or Marie ,marieesthercharles@gmail.com!

story:
What we do and why we need you

The world is a dangerous place for small business owners and seems to be rigged against them. How can a seed business grow into a flourishing, competitive company when the financial hurdles are too high and the rungs too far apart? Apex creditors (investors) and clients alike, demand testimonials, certificates and awards, before the entrepreneur has gotten a foothold on the base of the mountain he or she must climb to attain these accolades. All small entrepreneurs—regardless of whether they produce handbags, rear livestock, offer HR services, bed and breakfast, renovation or are engaged in something else entirely, are required to master highly-technical skills. To survive, they must understand the intricacies of SEO, be heavily engaged on social media and in general spend dozens of hours and hundreds of dollars every month polishing their corporate image.

Wouldn’t it be nice if someone could take care of all that technological wizardry, so that they could concentrate on their core business? That is where The Cornerstones of World Business comes in. We aim to be the SMART SME’s alternative to a costly website. Instead of spending thousands setting up website and hundreds of hours per year monitoring SEO trends, managing, promoting and maintaining a dedicated website, SMEs can set up a corporate profile for a symbolic fee (less than the price of a Happy Meal) and enjoy most of the benefits that a well-optimized website would yield, saving hundreds of hours and thousands of dollars.



How do we understand the plight of SMEs so well? Because we ARE a small business. We have systematically built an impressive resource, endeavoring to create REAL value for other SMEs. We did this without any external investment and construction has taken us 10 years. We will now enter a phase of rapid expansion, uniting and strengthening thousands of SMEs under our banner. This is where YOU come in. You have the power to help us spread the word, provide assistance and hope to struggling entrepreneurs who, due to financial constraints, have always drawn the short straw in business.  You can make a difference and help launch a truly global B2B Chamber of Commerce.

Vote for business, help ignite CornerstonesWORLD.com as a shiny beacon of hope, a light at the end of the tunnel and empower us to help millions of SMEs worldwide!

The problem

It is no secret that when starting up a small business or SME resources are usually scarce. SMEs are notoriously understaffed and short on technical knowledge, the acquisition of which further limits the time and funds they have to spend on their main business. Money and time are hard to come by and yet without investing in promotion of the company, how can it be expected to grow? 

Many SMEs resort to building their brand instead of developing their primary product or service. The Internet is a mighty tool and most SMEs begin by commissioning a website, as a platform to promote themselves. But that takes meticulous planning, investment in R&D and then more investment in maintenance and promotion, potentially adding up to thousands of dollars in the first months, when the company is most vulnerable to financial pressure. 
Would it not be nice  if all of the above could be taken care of by powerful professionals, leaving the entrepreneur to focus on his or her core business?  THAT is the beauty and elegance of the solution offered by The Cornerstones of World Business—you can set up a company profile, which is at least 90% as effective as a dedicated website. However, instead of spending thousands of dollars and hundreds of man-hours, a corporate profile on CornerstonesWORLD.com takes under 10 minutes to set up and costs from just $10 per year. This allows our Members to channel their savings towards what really matters—developing their core business. WE expend the time and financial resources on advertising and promotion of all our Members so that they do not have to.

About CSW

The Cornerstones of World Business (CSW) is an international business directory, founded to support small and medium-sized enterprises or SMEs. Our mission is to provide a fair and open forum, a marketing platform where the voices of the smaller companies can be heard above the din created by large companies elsewhere. We aim to provide top-tier advertising opportunities to SMEs with micro budgets for advertising, who cannot afford to spend over $1,000 per year, let alone per month.

By being more compact, faster, cheaper, better optimized and easier to maintain, CSW aims to replace cumbersome, conventional websites.

CSW offers quality advertising packages for SMEs from $10/YEAR.

 

Small businesses really appreciate affordable and effective marketing solutions.

  


What Memberships offer

Memberships are corporate profiles dedicated to the promotion of a specific company. They are significantly different from the address popups of free listings. To begin with, Memberships bump the company to the front of the line, i.e. Members are listed at the top of the category, before the alphabetically arranged free listings. Furthermore, Members enjoy the following benefits:

  • Logo
  • Spam-secure email form and Google-safe link to website
  • Description text (in several languages)
  • Social media links
  • Address with map
  • Photo gallery
  • Video
  • Service icons
  • B2B networking tools (company recommendation, service rating, etc.)
  • Mirrored listing in a second category

All that and more comes at just $10 per YEAR! Each Membership is a self-contained, self-sufficient website—as unique as it is affordable.

The full benefits of Membership can be found here: http://www.cornerstonesworld.com/benefits

Ultimately, CSW will become a lively forum where SMEs can interact, exchange ideas, services and partner up, driving their business forward, supporting one another and growing together. CSW will become a global chamber of commerce, where every company, regardless of size will have a fair chance to make a big splash and succeed.

Our history and motivation

We did not just wake up one morning and decide to take on the world. No. In the late 90s we ran an advertising agency for SMEs—trying to get them the most bang for their buck and place them into the conventional media at low cost. We discovered that helping to promote small businesses one at a time was neither scalable, nor sustainable. We cast about online for a fair, community-based solution designed to support and help SMEs, but found none. Sure, there were already many places one could splurge about funds for attention, but no platform that sought to unite businesses under the banner of keeping their funds in their pockets. We took up the challenge and in 2000 The Cornerstones of Latvian Business was born with the aim of helping members create cost-effective alternatives to corporate web pages. Fast-forward four years, as Latvia joined the EU, we made the decision to expand our network internationally.

We tried conventional investment in 2006, but in the end decided that no deal was better than a bad deal. Having suffered nearly a year’s setback due to springboards and presentations, we have not been keen to return to the ‘wishful-thinking well’ of traditional investor relations. And so we have struggled to keep our dream alive, but at least we did not sell out and let it become someone else’s dream.

We have no illusions that to truly become a Global Chamber of Commerce and live up to its name, the project needs a much larger team and more powerful infrastructure. However, we have decided to take it one step at a time and show you, our investors, what we can achieve before seeking funds for the next stage of expansion. Through crowdfunding we aim to shatter the paradigm of conventional investment and create something of great value for you and the business community as a whole.

What we need your help for

We would like to ask you to help support a fundraiser to relieve some of the costs that await us in the first two quarters of 2016. Over the past ten years we have made several large investments into the development and creation of the website you see before you today. However, quite a few challenges still lie ahead, hence, we decided to appeal to you, the business community, to help carry the cost for some of the features we are developing to serve you better. 

At the moment we are a tiny team of four and a half people (part time contributors), juggling dozens of full time jobs—from social media and PR management to content creation, client relations, quality analysis, accounting, development and IT, research, client support, product testing and many other tasks. We need your help to develop and deliver a more complete user experience and a more effective promotional platform for the benefit of all SMEs.

Here is a look at aspects of our seven-month budget, which would be greatly mitigated by the $42,400 target of this fundraiser:

Vital design and development target $13,500

1. New product development/programming

We have several new features planned that will grant even more control, while improving the reach and effectiveness of the Member package we offer, without driving up the cost. Top contributors will receive a project plan that details the game-changing features under development.

2. Create a responsive design for mobile devices

The infrastructure of the website has not been overhauled in several years. The market share of mobile devices continues to grow exponentially, setting a clear trend and we must move with the times. Several new templates must be created for the website, to make it load quickly and work effectively on palm-held devices. This compatibility is essential to remain competitive in today’s market and conquer the Internet marketing arena, taking our Members to the pinnacle of promotion.

3. Improve site search functionality

We aim to broaden the searchable criteria and add localization filters to our query parameters. These features will enable our visitors to narrow down their search results and pinpoint exactly companies or business contacts that interest them, greatly saving time and thereby enhancing their user experience. From a media point of view, our aim remains to present visitors with the BEST companies available in each country we cover.

4. Translation

To be effective on the global arena, we aim to offer the website in ten languages, including German, Portuguese, Spanish, French and Russian. This is a massive task, as we need to translate not only the interface, but much of the content, as well.

Database quality analyst team expansion: Target: $11,200
($1,600 per month)

We would like to add two people to our QA team and appeal to you to share the cost with us, by supporting this goal with $800 per person per month (we will bridge the gap to complete the salaries). These additional team members will allow us to better control the flow of submissions to our website and help filter the database for quality and safety, while testing and monitoring the directory and website functionality for errors.

Website promotion Target: $7,700 ($1,100 per month)

Our aim is to minimize the advertising budgets of SMEs. However, in order as to fulfill this mighty mandate, we must spread our message far and wide. We need to mount a substantial advertising campaign and amplify our presence. We cannot bring about change if those we are trying to help are buried too deep under their troubles to hear us or see our searchlight. We can only guide these floundering ships to a safe harbor if we can reach out to them and guide them, so help us build a light tower that can pierce the darkest clouds!

We need to advertise locally and not only in Europe and North America, but in developing countries as well. Obviously, a global campaign costs vastly more than the amount we have earmarked for the first half of 2016. At this stage we aim to achieve a trickledown effect that will push the costs of promotion even further down for developing markets, as we target the most effective and stable economies.

We have slowly built The Cornerstones of World Business to the tune of $15-20 thousand PER YEAR over the past ten years. We always believed in the adage that “if we build it, they will come”. But as it turns out: the lost need to be found, the clueless need clues and the ignorant need information—in other words, everyone needs an invitation. You can help us get the word out—share and promote this campaign and our press releases. To distribute one press release properly via PRweb.com costs $369. We need to publish at least two releases per month, be well publicized and have a strong presence in the media.

We will advertise on a large scale to inform, attract and ultimately help millions of struggling SMEs.

Local dedicated server, mirrored hosting in Australia and North America: $6,000

  • Server: $3,000 (shipping to Europe is not free)
  • Local server installation, security reinforcement and software: $1,600
  • GoDaddy installation and dedicated hosting: $1,400/year

Mitigate funding campaign running costs: $4,000

  • Indiegogo’s stake
  • Physical rewards

There are, of course, many additional running costs including rent, computers and other equipment, software, salaries to mention but a few. These as always, we take upon ourselves. If we exceed our goal, we shall expand our team with more members, who will boost the content quality and outreach of the international business directory. We will build new features such as a moderated business forum through which SMEs will be able to contact captains of industry, pundits, investors and leaders around the world. We will expand our testimonials, job search, client rating and other features. In other words, we will sooner assume our role as a Global Chamber of Commerce. So join Network Orange, vote for business and support our cause to help SMEs succeed.

Even though our prices are already as low as can be by North American or European standards, there are companies in the developing world that cannot afford to promote themselves. Let's change the world together! In ADDITION to your standard reward, we pledge to upgrade 10 companies to Full Membership for a year, in a developing country of your choice for every $150 you contribute. The hard-working entrepreneurs in developing countries also deserve their place in the limelight and their share of fair trade. Let's rescue small business, by boosting one company at a time!

We trust that you will enjoy the perks we have lined up and look forward to rewarding your generosity and possibly, working together with you in a joint effort to save the endangered SMEs of the world from budget-stifling extinction!


Business Plan and scope of this fundraiser

With this effort, we hope to achieve a set number of goals, over a period of seven months—as detailed below. This is our first fundraiser ever and we will utilize this opportunity to show you just how effective we can be with your support. 
December 2015
  • Purchase equipment and software

January 2016

  • Hire and train staff (two quality analysts)
  • Begin development (design and translations)
  • Launch promotional campaign

February 2016

  • Begin coding development
  • Configuration and testing of new server

March-May 2016

  • Test and reinforce server security
  • Migration to new server
  • Establish mirror hosting (via GoDaddy servers)
  • Launch new website interface

June 2016

  • Project completion

Perks

ALL contributors receive the right to submit their idea on how the site can be improved to better suit their business for the next wave of development. Once we have the essentials out of the way with this drive, we will be putting together a plan of the best ideas to tackle in the latter part of 2016. THANK YOU all for your support! 

Other ways to show your support

This is not just a fundraising endeavor—it is an IDEA-raising effort. We are reaching out to the business community, with an offer to guide the hand of our creatives. Have your say and help shape the business resource to better suit YOUR business—would you like us to develop an on-site store, a jobs market or something else entirely? Comment and let us know what you think. Your feedback is vital, let's perfect The Cornerstones of World Business together!

You can really help us by spreading the word:

 Share on Facebook

 Share on Twitter

Review The Cornerstones of World Business on your blog, e-zine, newspaper, podcast or other media. THANK YOU for all that you do!
story_txt:
What we do and why we need youThe world is a dangerous place
for small business owners and seems to be rigged against them. How can a seed
business grow into a flourishing, competitive company when the financial
hurdles are too high and the rungs too far apart? Apex creditors (investors)
and clients alike, demand testimonials, certificates and awards, before the
entrepreneur has gotten a foothold on the base of the mountain he or she must
climb to attain these accolades. All small entrepreneurs—regardless of whether
they produce handbags, rear livestock, offer HR services, bed and breakfast,
renovation or are engaged in something else entirely, are required to master
highly-technical skills. To survive, they must understand the intricacies of
SEO, be heavily engaged on social media and in general spend dozens of hours
and hundreds of dollars every month polishing their corporate image.


Wouldn’t it be nice if someone could take care of all that technological wizardry, so that they could concentrate on their core business? That is where The Cornerstones of World Business comes in. We aim to be the SMART SME’s
alternative to a costly website. Instead of spending thousands setting up
website and hundreds of hours per year monitoring SEO trends, managing,
promoting and maintaining a dedicated website, SMEs can set up a corporate
profile for a symbolic fee (less than the price of a Happy Meal) and enjoy most of the benefits that a well-optimized website would yield, saving hundreds of
hours and thousands of dollars.How do we understand the plight of SMEs so well? Because we ARE a small business. We have systematically built an impressive resource, endeavoring to create REAL value for other SMEs. We did this without any external investment and construction has taken us 10 years. We will now enter a phase of rapid expansion, uniting and strengthening thousands of SMEs under our banner. This is where YOU come in. You have the power to help us spread the word, provide assistance and hope to struggling entrepreneurs who, due to financial constraints, have always drawn the short straw in business.  You can make a difference and help
launch a truly global B2B Chamber of Commerce.
Vote for business, help ignite CornerstonesWORLD.com as a shiny beacon of hope, a light at the end of the tunnel and empower us to help millions of SMEs worldwide!
The problemIt is no secret that when starting up a small business or SME resources are usually scarce. SMEs are notoriously understaffed and short on technical knowledge, the acquisition of which further limits the time and funds they have to spend on their main business. Money and time are hard to come by and yet without investing in promotion of the company, how can it be expected to grow? Many SMEs resort to building their brand instead of developing their primary product or service. The Internet is a mighty tool and most SMEs begin by commissioning a website, as a platform to promote themselves. But that takes meticulous planning, investment in R&D and then more investment in maintenance and promotion, potentially adding up to thousands of dollars in the first months, when the company is most vulnerable to financial pressure. 
Would it not be nice  if all of the above could be taken care of by powerful professionals, leaving the entrepreneur to focus on his or her core business?  THAT is the beauty and elegance of the solution offered by The Cornerstones of World Business—you can set up a company profile, which is at least 90% as effective as a dedicated website. However, instead of spending thousands of dollars and hundreds of man-hours, a corporate profile on CornerstonesWORLD.com takes under 10 minutes to set up and costs from just $10 per year. This allows our Members to channel their savings towards what really matters—developing their core business. WE expend the time and financial resources on advertising and promotion of all our Members so that they do not have to.

About CSW
The Cornerstones of World
Business (CSW) is an international business directory, founded to support small
and medium-sized enterprises or SMEs. Our mission is to provide a fair and open
forum, a marketing platform where the voices of the smaller companies can be
heard above the din created by large companies elsewhere. We aim to provide
top-tier advertising opportunities to SMEs with micro budgets for advertising, who
cannot afford to spend over $1,000 per year, let alone per month.



By being more compact, faster,
cheaper, better optimized and easier to maintain, CSW aims to replace
cumbersome, conventional websites.
CSW offers quality advertising
packages for SMEs from $10/YEAR.

 Small businesses really appreciate affordable and effective marketing solutions.
  

What Memberships offer
Memberships are corporate
profiles dedicated to the promotion of a specific company. They are significantly different from the
address popups of free listings. To begin with, Memberships bump the company to
the front of the line, i.e. Members are listed at the top of the category,
before the alphabetically arranged free listings. Furthermore, Members enjoy
the following benefits:


Logo


Spam-secure
email form and Google-safe link to website


Description
text (in several languages)


Social
media links


Address with
map


Photo
gallery


Video


Service
icons


B2B
networking tools (company recommendation, service rating, etc.)


Mirrored
listing in a second category


All that and more comes at just
$10 per YEAR! Each Membership is a self-contained, self-sufficient website—as unique
as it is affordable.



The full benefits of Membership
can be found here: http://www.cornerstonesworld.com/benefits

Ultimately, CSW will become a
lively forum where SMEs can interact, exchange ideas, services and partner up,
driving their business forward, supporting one another and growing together.
CSW will become a global chamber of commerce, where every company, regardless
of size will have a fair chance to make a big splash and succeed.

Our history and motivation

We did not just wake up one morning and
decide to take on the world. No. In the late 90s we ran an advertising agency
for SMEs—trying to get them the most bang for their buck and place them into
the conventional media at low cost. We discovered that helping to promote small
businesses one at a time was neither scalable, nor sustainable. We cast about
online for a fair, community-based solution designed to support and help SMEs,
but found none. Sure, there were already many places one could splurge about
funds for attention, but no platform that sought to unite businesses under the
banner of keeping their funds in their pockets. We took up the challenge and in
2000 The Cornerstones of Latvian
Business was born with the aim of helping members create cost-effective
alternatives to corporate web pages. Fast-forward four years, as Latvia joined
the EU, we made the decision to expand our network internationally.
We tried conventional investment in 2006, but
in the end decided that no deal was better than a bad deal. Having suffered
nearly a year’s setback due to springboards and presentations, we have not been
keen to return to the ‘wishful-thinking well’ of traditional investor relations.
And so we have struggled to keep our dream alive, but at least we did not sell
out and let it become someone else’s dream.
We have no illusions that to truly become a Global Chamber of Commerce
and live up to its name, the project needs a much larger team and more powerful
infrastructure. However, we have decided to take it one step at a time and show
you, our investors, what we can achieve before seeking funds for the next stage
of expansion. Through crowdfunding we aim to shatter the paradigm of
conventional investment and create something of great value for you and the
business community as a whole.


What we need your help for

We would like to ask you to help support a fundraiser to relieve some of the costs that await us in the first two quarters of 2016. Over the past ten years we have made several large investments into the development and creation of the website you see before you today. However, quite a few challenges still lie ahead, hence, we decided to appeal to you, the business community, to help carry the cost for some of the features we are developing to serve you better. 
At the moment we are a tiny team of four and a half people (part time contributors), juggling dozens of full time jobs—from social media and PR management to content creation, client relations, quality analysis, accounting, development and IT, research, client support, product testing and many other tasks. We need your help to develop and deliver a more complete user experience and a more effective promotional platform for the benefit of all SMEs.

Here is a look at aspects of
our seven-month budget, which would be greatly mitigated by the $42,400 target
of this fundraiser:
Vital design and development target $13,500

1. New product development/programming

We have several new
features planned that will grant even more control, while improving the reach
and effectiveness of the Member package we offer, without driving up the cost.
Top contributors will receive a project plan that details the game-changing
features under development.
2. Create a responsive design for mobile devices
The
infrastructure of the website has not been overhauled in several years. The
market share of mobile devices continues to grow exponentially, setting a clear
trend and we must move with the times. Several new templates must be created
for the website, to make it load quickly and work effectively on palm-held
devices. This compatibility is essential to remain competitive in today’s market
and conquer the Internet marketing arena, taking our Members to the pinnacle of
promotion.
3. Improve site search functionality
We aim to broaden the
searchable criteria and add localization filters to our query parameters. These
features will enable our visitors to narrow down their search results and pinpoint
exactly companies or business contacts
that interest them, greatly saving time and thereby enhancing their user
experience. From a media point of view, our aim remains to present visitors
with the BEST companies available in each country we cover.
4. Translation
To be effective on the global arena, we aim
to offer the website in ten languages, including German, Portuguese, Spanish,
French and Russian. This is a massive task, as we need to translate not only
the interface, but much of the content, as well.

Database quality analyst team expansion: Target: $11,200 ($1,600
per month)

We would like to add two people
to our QA team and appeal to you to share the cost with us, by supporting this
goal with $800 per person per month (we will bridge the gap to complete the
salaries). These additional team members will allow us to better control the
flow of submissions to our website and help filter the database for quality and
safety, while testing and monitoring the directory and website functionality

story:
Greetings!

My name is Kristen Bailey and I am the proud owner of Sweets & Meats LLC.  We are a licensed and insured caterer and mobile BBQ vendor.  We launched our business on 11/2/2014 after years of hosting backyard BBQ's in our home.  My partner Anton is a self taught cook, although he learned a few tips from his grandfather Joe in Alabama, where he has roots. We've always had a passion for people and good food and there is no better way to bring people together than over a great meal. We've had a lot of encouragement from friends and family, which ultimately led to this journey.

For the past year, I along with my partner Anton, mother Michelle, and countless family members and friends who have donated their time and resources, have served up some of Cincinnati's best BBQ at festivals, food truck rallies, neighborhood events, fundraisers, breweries and private parties. Additionally, we competed at two local KCBS sanctioned BBQ competitions.  We literally started with no capital, but made a way and every week we come back with more, investing every dime back into our business. We've always had an entrepreneurial spirit and my business background and networking ability coupled with Anton's skills in the kitchen and genuine charisma, makes us a perfect team.  We really complement one another both in life and business and feel we have something unique.  We make everything from the rub, to the sauce, to dishing up homemade goodness!


The purpose of this campaign is to raise funds needed for our BBQ trailer build with Southern Dimensions out of Georgia.  This BBQ trailer is necessary in order to continue building our business. It will take Sweets & Meats BBQ to the next level. While we'd love to open a brick & mortar, we simply don't have the capital. We love the idea of being mobile without all the additional set up and breakdown time, wear and tear, and weather interference we've experienced during our first year as a mobile operation. We'll also enjoy the freedom that comes with having an enclosed mobile food trailer. We'll have the capacity to serve larger crowds more efficiently and in turn, land bigger jobs.  

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are seeking to purchase a 24 ft. BBQ trailer with a 16 ft. commercial kitchen and 8 ft. porch for our smokers. The trailer has 6 ft. gull wings which not only make it really cool (think Batman), but enable us to store additional items, which has presented a challenge for us with our current tent set up and caravan to events. The kitchen will be fully functional with a convection oven, 5 bay steam table, 4 compartment sink, refrigerator, serving window, prep tables and all the other things we'll need to run a successful BBQ food operation. Our invoice is $28,900 plus tax and our BBQ trailer can be built in five weeks. Our plan is to be on the road in March 2016, yet another huge leap of faith!
  • Not only will having an enclosed BBQ trailer establish us in the food truck community, but it will help us gain admittance into some of Cincinnati's top events, extending our reach. We'd like to serve BBQ on a regular basis and are often overlooked due to our current set up. There is a huge demand for smoked meats, homemade sides and dessert in Cincinnati and we are bringing the BOOM, not to mention some really cool rewards for contributing to our campaign.  We are most excited about hosting a pig roast for all of our Backers who contribute at the $100 level.
  • Should we not meet our goal, Sweets & Meats will continue to strive for a BBQ trailer, but will still continue to operate out of our commissary at the Patriot Center of Cincinnati.  Any proceeds in excess of our goal or in the event we are severely underfunded, we'll use toward our monthly rent and truck expenses. We will make a way to get our BBQ trailer one way or another:)

The Impact

  • There is a need for home cooked meals.  We live in a society where everything is rushed, including our food.  BBQ forces us to slow things down a bit, offering families the opportunity to savor delicious food that is homemade at an affordable price. We need to be more accessible to make an impact.
  • During our first year in business we participated in over 25 events, including but not limited to the Springfield Food Truck Competition, Cincy Riverfest (WEBN Fireworks), Inaugural Kings Island Food Truck Rally, Madisonville Jazz & BBQ Festival, Mt. Washington Pumpkin Chuck, and Dragon Boat Festival. We'd LOVE to do more, full-time.
  • Simply put, without YOU, there is no US!

Risks & Challenges

We are concerned that we may not get funded.  There is a lot of grant money and accelerators available to tech based companies, but not much in the way of restaurants.  We are in a high risk industry where 9/10 businesses fail.  We plan to work harder and smarter to ensure our success.  Through being conservative, we've been able to grow leaps and bounds in a short time. We plan to re-invest in our business so that we can continue growing.  I have over 10 years in the banking industry as a Branch Manager and helping small business owners in something I enjoy!  I plan to use this knowledge and apply the things I've shared with others in my own business. Slow and steady wins the race!

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways you can help spread the word about what Sweets & Meats is doing.  Beyond your financial support, we ask that you  pray for us (if you're the prayerful type).  This journey hasn't been easy and we are blessed to be in a position to follow our dream.

Please follow us online:

www.facebook.com/sweetsandmeats

www.twitter.com/sweetsandmeats

www.instagram.com/sweetsandmeatsbbq

Please share our posts and refer us for catering and events!

www.sweetsandmeatsbbq.com

The Indiegogo share tools make it really easy to share our message also!  The more people we can share our message with, the better chance we have of getting funded.  THANK YOU for your trust and support!

story:
IMPORTANT NOTE.  With only a few hours to go we are still a long way short. Attached to the photo gallery is a copy of a very recent  quote from the Korean Hospital to do the operation (US$16,000)

Help!!!  This young Mongolian boy needs your help this Christmas.  Right now.

(see his picture at end of this story)

His name is Hasbilbeg and he lives in Mongolia.

Very sadly he has a brain tumor. (see description below)

Unless he gets the correct surgery right now he will die.

  Unfortunately  Mongolia doesn't have the surgery equipment or the trained staff to do the operation.

Therefore his only hope is to have this life saving operation in another country, for example Korea or China.

Sadly he needs this operation now....within the next 5 days.

Mongolia is a 3rd world country.  Its poverty level was estimated at 29.8 percent of the population,  by the World Bank in 2012.

His Story.

Hasbilbeg is the eldest son of a family of 5 children.  He is 13 years old.

Like most  children in Mongolia he enjoys horse riding and playing with his brothers and sisters.

Unfortunately his father can't get much work , and what little work he does get just covers food for the family.

 His mother is busy looking after the family and also has little chance of employment in Mongolia.

His problem was diagnosed recently when he started having nose bleeds for no apparent reason.

The disease he has been diagnosed with is angiofibroma.

( Nasopharyngeal angiofibroma  (also called juvenile nasopharyngeal  angiofibroma) is a histological benign but locally aggressive vascular tumor that grows in the back of the nasal cavity. It most commonly affects adolescent males ).

 Only 3 other people have the disease in Mongolia.

Normally he is just a happy boy looking forward to school and time with his family.

Hasbilbeg needs your help now...

The operation is urgent  now...otherwise he will die.

It is true there are many people in the world today with brain tumors but they have family and friends and can have the operation done locally in their own country and usually have the funds to cover it.

Hasbileg has no one who can help him...except maybe you.

Can you help?

The amount required...to cover the airfare, the operation and return airfare is US$20,055.20

...if 400 people donated US$50 the target would be achieved...or

...if 200 people donated US$100..again the target would be achieved.

..if 40 people gave US$500..again we would achive the goal...

Why should we support this young boy....well I believe in western countries we are long past covering our needs and are now looking for our wants to be covered.

We are extremely well off in the western world...and now is an opportunity for us to help someone in a 3rd world country with a small donation.

Please act now....your donation, however small will really help.

It's Christmas time...the time of giving

Who am I and why am I doing this?

My name is David and during the last 11 years I have traveled to Mongolia 8 times with a team of people.  I live in Perth, Western Australia.

During our visits we have done humanitarian work such as building playgrounds in towns that had none, building and refurbishing rooms with furniture and wall signs  for the deaf, financing kindergartens so that poor parents could find work and get out of poverty and much, much more.

During these visits I have got to know the Mongolian people and found out what a wonderful group of people they are...despite their poverty.

This young boy's aunt contacted me and asked if I could help...hence this plea.

So...

Please act now and help this young boy in Mongolia get a 2nd chance at life.

Donate now.

$50, $100..or whatever you feel comfortable with.

It will make a huge difference to this young boy.

Thank you.

David Shaw.

story:
A little about myself

Hello, my name is Joshua Durrah and my goal is to bring a JJ’s Fish and Chicken franchise to Sioux Falls.

My entire professional life has been spent providing the best experience possible for customers. From washing dishes at Famous Dave's to taking calls at Capital One, my focus has always been on the customer.

In 2001 I left Milwaukee and came to Sioux Falls, and since then I’ve bounced around various jobs, getting familiar with the food service industry and the local business community. I was involved in the grand openings of Buffalo Wild Wings, Grand Falls Casino, and Capital One. At Capital One, the rule I set for myself was to never let a caller hang up without being satisfied, and this attitude helped me get promoted to supervisor where I could encourage others to do the same.

I left Capital One because recently I’ve noticed a void that needed to be filled in the local food scene. There are very few places to go for food after 10 o’clock at night. This led me to think: what if there was a new, family-friendly option that served fresh food, was open all hours, and brought more jobs to Sioux Falls? Starting my own business has long been a goal of mine, and with this restaurant I can provide a benefit to the community while achieving that dream. That is what I want to make happen, and it can only be done with your help.


What I need. What you get.

  • I am trying to raise $35,000. Yes, this is a lot of money. But opening a restaurant is a lofty goal, especially without a team of investors. That is why I wanted to turn to the community of Sioux Falls and the surrounding areas to build a restaurant for the people, by the people.

  • I tried to create a diverse number of funding levels so that you are able to participate in this project no matter your financial situation. The higher level will get you either a deal on food when we open or the chance to participate in the “Waffle Wednesday” events I’ll be holding every Wednesday in March at The Bakery.

  • Even if I don’t fully reach my goal, the money raised in this campaign will still go toward this project. There are people interested in this project that want to gauge the public’s level of interest before they jump on board themselves, so your contribution and support is invaluable when it comes to making that happen.

  • All of our contribution levels will get your name on our "JJ's Wall of Fame" that will hang in the resturaunt when it opens.


The Sioux Falls Impact

As I said before, this is going to have a range of positive impacts on the Sioux Falls community:

  • I’ll provide more local jobs at competitive wages. Every new establishment in our area supports the Sioux Falls economy. I believe in that and I hope you do too.

  • The cuisine that I’ll be serving is unique for Sioux Falls. No where else can you get homestyle chicken, fish, and waffles prepared fresh to order.

  • As a father to two kids, a family friendly environment is important to me. JJ’s will be right for individuals of all ages and from all walks of life.

  • My restaurant will fill the need in the local food scene for 24 hour, late night options. This is for barflys, night owls, or anyone else craving chicken and waffles at 4 in the morning.


That’s It! Thank you for your support!

I can’t express how grateful I am for your interest and your taking the time to look at my Indiegogo Campaign. No matter how you can support me in this project I hope to see you in a JJ’s here in Sioux Falls soon.

If you have any more questions feel free to email me at: greatprestigecompanies@gmail.com

story:
Short Summary

Nfatuated Cosmetics is an Up-and-Coming Makeup line, based in Atlanta Ga. We are dedicated to making products that are non-toxic, fur baby friendly, and inclusive of all races and skin shades.

     


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to raise $10,000 this will allow us to purchase raw materials and components (bottles, jars, labels,etc)

Products that will be released after launch include:

  • Nfatuated's Oil-free foundation (25 shades) (water-proof, vegan,)
  • Nfatuated's Freestyle brow gel(water-proof, smudge-proof, vegan)
  • Nfatuated's loose eyeshadows and pigments 
  • Nfatuated's strobe powder ( 3 colors)
If our $10,000 goal is exceeded we will add more products to the collection for immediate release. 

These products will include:

  • Nfatuated's liquid lips( a cream lipstick)
  • Nfatuated's skin type specific makeup primers
  • Nfatuated's gel eye liner

The Difference

Nfatuated isn't just another makeup line. We are dedicated to designing safe products for all women and we encourage our customers to interact with the developer to ensure our brand is always aligned with the needs and desires of our supporters. Imagine a brand where your opinion and concerns matter. Instead of a brand telling you what to like, we let you tell us what to make. Do you have a new lipstick shade or eyeshadow color idea? Let us know and we will be more than happy to add it to our collection. To show our appreciation to our dedicated consumers, we name our shades after them.  


We don't believe in overpricing our products. We want everyone to be able to enjoy Nfatuated. #allbudgetsmatter



Risks & Challenges

Although we are confident about our goals, we understand that you may be concerned with the fact that we are a new company. Our team has been in the cosmetic manufacturing business for over 15 years and has formulated, developed, and produced many successful brands. The challenges we face depend on the amount of funds we receive. If we do not achieve our campaign goals, we will have to push back our launch date.


Other Ways You Can Help

We know that times are hard for everyone right now, so if you can't contribute it's OK. Here are a few other ways you can help us launch:

  • Like us on Facebook and Invite all of your friends to follow us.
  • Tell everyone you know about our campaign (Granny too)
  • Share our campaign on your social media.
  • Tell your favorite blogger about us.
  • If you are a makeup lover, do a review for us. (we will send you a sample in the mail) **limited offer**

story:
Short Summary

  • Ryan O'Rourke is the Founder and Roastmaster of Ironclad Coffee Roasters.  He is passionate about specialty coffee, and the heightened standards brought about what has been called the "third wave" movement (ask Ryan more about what that entails if you'd like to know!). 
  • When you come onboard as one of our backers, you are making it possible for us to make the challenging transition from life on the mission field to our new lives back home in the USA. As you might imagine, several years spent on the mission field do not place one in the most financially advantageous position.  :-)  ** This is why we need your help! **

  • This crowdfunding campaign is an essential piece of our plan to establish Ironclad Coffee Roasters and get it to where it needs to be without accruing massive amounts of debt.  Quite simply, if we cannot secure the funds needed, this roastery cannot be established.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We will need to raise $10,000 through this crowdfunding campaign.  We have already invested our own capital in the business and will continue to do so as things move along, but we need backers to get behind us to complete the essential items on our roasting facility to appease government inspectors. Most of these repairs and improvements came as a total surprise to us, so we do not have nearly the funds needed.
  • We are offering some exciting and fun perks in appreciation for your support of our dream.  All the perk levels feature something (or many somethings) of high quality that you can share with those you love.  We've done our best to be as generous as possible without defeating the purpose of raising the necessary start-up capital.  See the "perks" section to the right for all the details.

  • We have chosen the "flexible" funding model.  This means even if we do not reach our entire goal, we still come away with what we're able to raise.  Of course, we hope we are able to raise the full amount, because that's what we need!

The Impact

  • "Honest coffee." That's our company tagline.  We want to make a difference in our community, not only by supplying coffee lovers with the best possible coffee experience, but by donating a portion of our profits to worthy charitable causes in our community.  So, when you help us get this roastery up and running, you also help us "share the love" by giving something back to those in need.  
  • Our experience on the mission field has given us valuable experience in how best to help meet the needs of people who genuinely lack some of life's essentials.  

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you're not in a position to back us financially right now, you can lend us a hand by creating some "buzz" amongst your own social contacts.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools right on this page to spread the word to your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter, etc.  Please, also, share this with your friends and family who may like to contribute to our campaign but may not be active online.
  • Finally, please sign up for our newsletter to keep up with the latest on what's happening as we build Ironclad Coffee Roasters.
Thank you so very much for your consideration!

story:
Hi!

My name is Doha Winters, and I am the thirteen-year-old founder of Fire Fiction, a story sharing website. Alongside encouraging young authors with Fire Fiction, I am working on my first book, The Lumen Chronicles. 

What is The Lumen Chronicles?

The Lumen Chronicles is a trilogy.

"We’ve all been told fairytales. They always end with the Prince marrying the Princess, or the Bad Guy being defeated. It’s never been like that for me. My name is Redd, and this is my story. Forget what you’ve read before. This is what really happened."

-Extract from Redd, the first story in The Lumen Chronicles.

The Lumen Chronicles  takes three classic fairytales, adding in twists that will help you find the hidden magic within.

The Lumen Chronicles features fairytale heroines as you've never seen them before, giving them new, stronger characters. 

Where Do I Come In?

With this campaign, I am hoping to raise the funds to have my first book, The Lumen Chronicles, professionally edited and illustrated.

Even by donating a few dollars, you can take me one step closer to my dream of becoming a published author!

Any Strings Attached?

Absolutely not! This campaign is completely transparent; donate and enjoy the perks!  

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some people just can't contribute, but don’t worry- you can still help:

  • Please just get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. You can do this simply by using the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you very much!

story:
Help A Dream

We all have dreams. Having dreams is a way of coping with our reality, no matter how harsh, monotonous or plain it is. Dreams inspire us to get out of bed in the morning, to work harder and get through each day in hopes that we draw closer to our destination. Hopes and dreams intertwine in the way that love and humankind do: one cannot exist without the other. It's that ray of hope that keeps a dream alive. And my ray is shining brighter than ever.

Few words about me

My name is Despina, 26, I live in Greece and my story is textbook failure. Growing up, I was poised to be someone with a great future, destined for success. Always a perfect student and an example for the others. My parents and my teachers had the highest of hopes for me. My downfall came when I finished school and went to college. I was privileged to have a family that could support me for 4 years while I was studying computer technology and I could not be more thankful to them for that. The problem was that I felt unhappy. This was not the future I was dreaming for myself. Here in Greece, as many of you may know, things are really bad. The unemployment rate hit new heights at 25.6% and my generation is forced to immigrate for a chance at a better life. I will not surrender, I will stay in my country, I will not be defeated by my fears, I will succeed.

Let there be hope

Every night when I lie on my bed, I'm thinking frantically about the future. And one night it hit me. I came up with an idea of a website that is really innovative, hasn't been done before and could change the way we pick which hotel to book. It's new, it's fresh. I wish I could tell you more about the website, but it being just an idea as of now, I'm afraid it could be potentially copied.

So, why would you fund an idea you have no clue about?

  • You love traveling.
  • Just sleeping in a hotel is not enough for you.
  • You want your money's worth every time you're booking a hotel.
  • You need more details about a hotel than just the pictures and the reviews provided by the usual websites.
  • And last but, certainly not least, you have dreams, like me.
  • Your opinions will be heard louder than ever before.

Your funding will help with

  • the web design.
  • for the global domain registration.
  • for contacting every hotel that will be a part of this project, starting from Greece and expanding to the whole world eventually.
  • Graphic designers.
  • iOS & Android applications.
Every little help is appreciated and I am deeply thankful to each and every one of you.

Dreams inspire us to get out of bed in the morning, to work harder and get through each day in hopes that we draw closer to our destination. Hopes and dreams intertwine in the way that love and humankind do: one cannot exist without the other. It's that ray of hope that keeps a dream alive. And my ray is shining brighter than ever.Few words about meMy name is Despina, 26, I live in Greece and my story is textbook failure. Growing up, I was poised to be someone with a great future, destined for success. Always a perfect student and an example for the others. My parents and my teachers had the highest of hopes for me. My downfall came when I finished school and went to college. I was privileged to have a family that could support me for 4 years while I was studying computer technology and I could not be more thankful to them for that. The problem was that I felt unhappy. This was not the future I was dreaming for myself. Here in Greece, as many of you may know, things are really bad. The unemployment rate hit new heights at 25.6% and my generation is forced to immigrate for a chance at a better life. I will not surrender, I will stay in my country, I will not be defeated by my fears, I will succeed.Let there be hopeEvery night when I lie on my bed, I'm thinking frantically about the future. And one night it hit me. I came up with an idea of a website that is really innovative, hasn't been done before and could change the way we pick which hotel to book. It's new, it's fresh. I wish I could tell you more about the website, but it being just an idea as of now, I'm afraid it could be potentially copied.So, why would you fund an idea you have no clue about?
You love traveling.
Just sleeping in a hotel is not enough for you.
You want your money's worth every time you're booking a hotel.
You need more details about a hotel than just the pictures and the reviews provided by the usual websites.
And last but, certainly not least, you have dreams, like me.
Your opinions will be heard louder than ever before.
Your funding will help with
the web design.
for the global domain registration.
for contacting every hotel that will be a part of this project, starting from Greece and expanding to the whole world eventually.
Graphic designers.
iOS & Android applications.
Every little help is appreciated and I am deeply thankful to each and every one of you.

story:
Chèr(e)s membres, 

 Apres 2 ans de création du projet de Melodie Date,beaucoup d’Amour et d’Amitié se sont créés. 

Aujourd'hui, j'ai besoin de vous! Melodie date à besoin de grandir. 

Malheureusement je n'ai pas les fonds nécessaires pour pouvoir faire avancer mon projet comme je le souhaiterai. 

 Alors oui, avec les joues rouges, je fais appel à vous. Cela n'a jamais été dans mon tempérament, j'ai toujours voulu me débrouiller seule mais aujourd'hui, je prends mon courage à deux mains et je rabaisse un peu ma fierté (il faut l'admettre) en mettant en place une cagnotte avec possibilité de donner anonymement. 

 Libre donc à vous de donner ce que vous souhaitez afin que ce projet se développe et continue d’exister. 

 Je compte sincèrement sur vous et vous dit MERCI pour votre présence (indispensable car sans elle,Melodiedate n’existerait pas !) , votre compréhension … et vos dons!

story:
We are Marketplace Ministries & we are passionate about creating opportunities to share God's love with people in the Marketplace. Our organization creates self sustaining businesses that reach their community in ways that have a positive long term impact.

     Our most recent development is an Egg Farm that will provide food, water & jobs in a village recovering from war. Our goal is to provide an egg a day to every child in the local schools, as well as clean water to the entire village. 

     We are currently providing over 1500 eggs a month to local hungry children & we just purchased the land needed to develop the farm. We need your support specifically to help us drill the well that will provide the village with clean water.

     Our goal with your donations is to begin drilling the Well January 1. This timeline will allow us to start providing water for the village as soon as possible. Join us by donating & help us spread the word about how we are changing an entire generation!
